definitions.definition: Any small model of a person or animal able to be moved by strings or rods, or in the form of a glove .
A person, country, etc, controlled by another.
A poppet ; a small image in the human form; a doll.
The upright support for the bearing of the spindle in a lathe .

main_definition: Any small model of a person or animal able to be moved by strings or rods, or in the form of a glove .
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) A person, country, etc, controlled by another.
( obsolete ) A poppet ; a small image in the human form; a doll.
( engineering ) The upright support for the bearing of the spindle in a lathe .
